channel.title: 508 Server NPC, Item, etc. Files
channel.description:
Hey everyone!
I joined this forum a while ago, but I never even posted anything... :) I wanna get back into some RS private server stuff, but it's been a while since I used some of the old servers, and it seems that things have changed with the 508 servers.
First off, I'm wondering if anyone has any kind of documentation for Palidino76's files in the data folder. I'm also wondering if dialogue and shops are possible in 508, because I see no files that have to do with those.
Second, I'm wondering what I have to call/instance to create new objects, NPCs, etc in the source code itself.
Thanks! :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 08:56:53 pm[/size][hr]-Bump-
Anyone?
I looked at the source and figured out how to spawn NPCs.
However, I can't seem to figure out how to make item drops, or modify the location of certain objects, or add shops and dialogue.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 08:58:11 pm[/size][hr]I think I edited my post instead of bumping the thread, lol.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 09:48:30 pm[/size][hr]Hm, I think there isn't any dialogue stuff in 508...

item.title: 508 Server NPC, Item, etc. Files
item.dc:creator: @xyzz123 xyzz123
item.description:
@xyzz123 wrote:

Hey everyone!

I joined this forum a while ago, but I never even posted anything… I wanna get back into some RS private server stuff, but it’s been a while since I used some of the old servers, and it seems that things have changed with the 508 servers.

First off, I’m wondering if anyone has any kind of documentation for Palidino76’s files in the data folder. I’m also wondering if dialogue and shops are possible in 508, because I see no files that have to do with those.

Second, I’m wondering what I have to call/instance to create new objects, NPCs, etc in the source code itself.

Thanks! :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 08:56:53 pm[/size][hr]-Bump-

Anyone?

I looked at the source and figured out how to spawn NPCs.

However, I can’t seem to figure out how to make item drops, or modify the location of certain objects, or add shops and dialogue.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 08:58:11 pm[/size][hr]I think I edited my post instead of bumping the thread, lol.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 09:48:30 pm[/size][hr]Hm, I think there isn’t any dialogue stuff in 508…
